inclusion.criterion: Extracranial carotid or vertebral artery dissection with symptom onset within the last 7 days.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Imaging evidence of definite or probable dissection on MRI/MRA, CTA or ultrasound.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Cerebral angiography further revealed patent right ACA and MCA and patent left ACA and left MCA.

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications to either antiplatelet agents or anticoagulation therapy
exclusion.label: unknown
